meanings.definition: A town in ancient Greece, located in Phocis, near Delphi.
meanings.english_definition: An ancient Greek town in Phocis, near Delphi. It was a member of the Delphic Amphictyony.

examples.sentence: Amphissus was an important member of the Delphic Amphictyony.
examples.translation: アンフィサスはデルポイ聖地同盟の重要なメンバーでした。

etymology.value: From Ancient Greek Ἀμφισσός (Amphissós). The origin of the name is uncertain.
